name: Hollow Light
description:
Hollow Light: Deep into the Darkness - Take the light to the bottom of the pit and recover what is yours. Game Created for Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and Deeper).

 Platformer game where our protagonist's light extinguishes as time passes. Get from one firepit to the next one to restore your light! 

Controls: 

  • AS to move left/right
  • Space to jump Esc to exit

A game by

Albert Badosa Borja Martínez García Pau Arroyo Hinojosa Lourdes Pérez Indaverea & Juan Bautista Zambrana
